page.title: 03PRIVATE DEVELOPMENT-HOUSES
page.content: Before 1970 very little private development existed in this part of the village. Indeed there were very few private houses in Brandon at all. A small area of 12 bungalows and 4 houses began in 1965 near the vicarage but it was not until 1975 that large building contractors almost transformed Brandon into an area of private development.A very large private estate called "Dere Park" now lies west of the Sawmills (O.S. map reference 234393). A more exclusive development where houses are individually designed takes its name from the small stream "Scripton Gill", Scripton being the name of the land owners in the area years ago.
